Какими картинами знаменит архангельский Север?Истории «Муравейника»: Новгород за кадром чёрно- белой классики == Plot == The film tells about the great Russian scientist Mikhailo Lomonosov, who, after completing his studies in Germany, returns to Russia, where he dreams of creating scientific centers and opening a university.Михайло Ломоносов == Starring == * Boris Livanov as Mikhaylo Lomonosov * Asta Vihandi as Elizaveta Lomonosova * Vladimir Soshalsky as Shuvalov * Vladimir Belokurov as Prokop Andreevitch * Sergei Plotnikov as Archbishop * Yuri Rodionov as Popovsky * Aleksey Batalov as Muzhik * Ants Eskola as Rikhman * Janis Osis as Miller * Alfred Rebane as ShumakherМихайло Ломоносов (1955) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1955 films Category:Soviet films Category:Russian-language films
